author: Odeinoichus
title: Alfred Shreds a Mean Guitar.
review:
Set #71020 Friends are Family Alfred: Dressed in a really decked out coat and tails full of sequins and matching gold cummerbund, Alfred Pennyworth finds himself rocking the electric guitar during the closing credits of The LEGO Batman Movie. This variant is very well put together with a lot of excellent details. He also comes with a cloth coattail piece and matching white tie, although considering his suit has a gold tie printed on the torso, the white bow tie really adds a bit of irreverent humour to the look.

Overall this is another solid variant and a great figure from Series 2 of The LEGO Batman Movie Collectible Minifigures Wave. If you don't already own one I'd recommend tracking one down. Recommended.
